name: Hot or Cold (vtg2000)
description:
Hot Or Cold features extremely simple controls, and many characters and obstacle types. Switch quickly between two colors, blue and orange, to avoid obstacles and enemies, and use power-ups. You can only interact with objects of the same color, so switch colors appropriately.

Features 

  • Simple one tap controls
  • Various enemies and obstacles
  • Unlockable characters
  • Portals!
